duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform advisory and implementation services to address business needs throughout client organizations, alongside Senior Executives and peers.
Analyze complex quantitative/qualitative data, synthesize output, and communicate effectively to senior audiences.
Identify opportunities for change by analyzing client-specific capabilities, technologies, and processes.
Contribute to the development of client deliverables, build and analyze financial models and complex budgets.
Network with peers, engage in team-building, and give back to the community through outreach activities.
Develop professionally, staying up-to-date on technology trends, and assisting leadership with proposal development and presentations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Technology, Computer Science, Finance/Accounting, Supply Chain, HCM, or related field (minimum overall and major GPA of 3.0/4.0 preferred)
